/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a hazy orange, indicative of the sun setting in the background. The sun itself is partially obscured by the buildings, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a soft, warm light. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with the orange of the sunset and the gray of the buildings creating a harmonious palette.
